    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExpressionTree(java.lang.String expression)
      Expression tree constructor it takes the string as expression and send it to read binary tree method Does not mather the given string is prefix or postfix form it returns, if the given expression is postfix it reverses the string and send it to read binary tree method.

      TO evaluates the operations, i take the children as node and convert them ito integer in operation method
      BinaryTree readBinaryTree(java.util.Scanner exp)
      Method to read a binary tree It takes the string if it is an operator which means the node can have children but number so each time method call itself and when it reaches the number as last node or it has enough children it returns null also if the end of the string it returns null again I check the next index is number or operator if it is a number i get it and put in the node but since the numbers can not have children i assign nul for its right and left child

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExpressionTree

        public ExpressionTree(java.lang.String expression)
        Expression tree constructor it takes the string as expression and send it to read binary tree method Does not mather the given string is prefix or postfix form it returns, if the given expression is postfix it reverses the string and send it to read binary tree method.
        Parameters:
        expression - the given string it accepts prefix or postfix expression

        public int eval()
        my eval wrapper method returns the value of expression tree as integer
        Returns:

      • eval

        private BinaryTree.Node eval(BinaryTree.Node nodeRef)
        My helper eval method it takes the node and recursively calculates it according to occurred operator
        Parameters:
        nodeRef - takes node firstly it takes root of expression tree
        Returns:
        returns a new node and result of expression tree with in it

      • readBinaryTree

        public BinaryTree readBinaryTree(java.util.Scanner exp)
        Method to read a binary tree It takes the string if it is an operator which means the node can have children but number so each time method call itself and when it reaches the number as last node or it has enough children it returns null also if the end of the string it returns null again I check the next index is number or operator if it is a number i get it and put in the node but since the numbers can not have children i assign nul for its right and left child
        Overrides:
        readBinaryTree in class BinaryTree
        Parameters:
        exp - the scanner
        Returns:
        the binary tree
